body:
kennyj's test failed before fix.
````sh
% bundle exec ruby -Ilib:test test/application/rake_test.rb --name=test_copy_templates
Run options: --name=test_copy_templates --seed 31705

# Running tests:

rake aborted!
````

kennyj's test passes after fix.

````sh
% bundle exec ruby -Ilib:test test/application/rake_test.rb --name=test_copy_templates
Run options: --name=test_copy_templates --seed 21184

# Running tests:
````
